com.objetdirect.tatami.client.dnd
Class WidgetDnDController

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.dnd.IDnDController<WidgetSource,WidgetTarget>
      com.objetdirect.tatami.client.dnd.WidgetDnDController

public class WidgetDnDController
extends IDnDController<WidgetSource,WidgetTarget>

This class is the widget drag and drop controller. It contains the dojo widget's definition for a standard source, and the methods to register a panel as a source or a widget target.

Author:
rdunklau
